root.name: crop()
root.description: Crops the frame coming in from the camera. It seems common for cameras add lines to the top or bottom of an image and this can be useful for removing them. The parameters are affected by the current imageMode() from the parent applet. The imageMode() function changes the way the parameters work. For example, imageMode(CENTER) will change x and y to define the center of the image. A call to imageMode(CORNERS) will change the width and height parameters to define the x and y values of the opposite corner of the image.

parameter.label: x
parameter.description: int or float: x-coordinate of the image

parameter.label: y
parameter.description: int or float: y-coordinate of the image

parameter.label: width
parameter.description: int or float: width to display the image

parameter.label: height
parameter.description: int or float: width to display the image
